languages.text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot effect until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the wearer's area attack has at least one ally in the area of effect, this attack deals +15% damage.
All wearer's area attacks deal only 50% of their damage to wearer's allies.

When the wearer hits an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot effect until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% damage with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot effect until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot effect until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}盟友时，都会获得1层“狂热分子”{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}效果{/g}，效果持续至战斗结束。 狂热分子：每有1层“狂热分子”效果，装备者所有范围攻击造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会提高10%。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

traits.locale_text:
当装备者发动{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，如果目标范围至少存在一名盟友，则此次攻击造成的伤害提高15%。{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}{/g}
装备者的所有范围攻击只会对盟友造成50%伤害。

languages.text: Затрагивая союзника {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атакой по области{/g}, персонаж получает +1 уровень эффекта "фанатик", который сохраняется до конца боя. Фанатик: персонаж наносит на 10% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} атаками по области за каждый уровень эффекта.
languages.original_text:
Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} has at least one ally in the area of {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g}, this attack deals +15% damage.
All of the wearer's area attacks deal only 50% damage to the wearer's allies.

traits.locale_text:
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атака по области{/g} затрагивает хотя бы одного союзника персонажа, она наносит на 15% больше урона.
Все атаки персонажа по области наносят союзникам только 50% урона.

Когда {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атака по области{/g} затрагивает хотя бы одного союзника персонажа, она наносит на 15% больше урона.
Все атаки персонажа по области наносят союзникам только 50% урона.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}で味方を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}すると、戦闘終了まで使用者に狂信者{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}効果{/g}が1つ蓄積する。 狂信者：使用者は、狂信者効果の蓄積数ごとに範囲攻撃で、10%ずつ{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}範囲内に味方が一人以上いる場合、攻撃のダメージが+15%
味方に与える範囲攻撃ダメージが50%に減少。

languages.text: Si el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un aliado con un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g}, obtiene +1 acumulación del efecto fanático hasta el final del combate. Fanático: el portador inflige un 10 % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con sus ataques de área por cada acumulación de fanático.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot effect until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} del portador incluyen a al menos un aliado en el área de {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g}, infligen +15 % más de daño.
Todos los ataques de área del portador solo infligen un 50 % del daño a sus aliados.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einen Verbündeten mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erhält der Träger bis zum Ende des Kampfes +1 Stapel des Eiferer-Effektes. Eiferer: Der Träger verursacht für jeden Stapel des Eiferer-Effektes +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} mit seinen Flächenangriffen.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot effect until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} des Trägers mindestens einen Verbündeten im Bereich des {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekts{/g} hat, fügt dieser Angriff+15 % Schaden zu.
Alle Flächenangriffe des Trägers fügen den Verbündeten des Trägers nur 50 % Schaden zu.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un allié avec une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, l'utilisateur bénéficie de +1 cumul de l'effet Zélote jusqu'à la fin du combat. Zélote : les attaques de zone de l'utilisateur infligent +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires par cumul de Zélote.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot effect until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.

traits.locale_text:
Lorsqu'au moins un allié de l'utilisateur est présent dans la zone d'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} d'une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g}, cette attaque inflige +15 % de dégâts.
Les attaques de zone de l'utilisateur n'infligent que 50 % de dégâts à ses alliés.

languages.text: Takan kişi, bir dost birime {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} +1 bağnaz etkisi birikimi kazanır. Etkisi, çatışma sonuna dek sürer. Bağnaz: Takan kişi, her bağnaz etkisi birikiminde alan saldırılarıyla +%10 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g}, the wearer gains +1 stack of the zealot effect until the end of combat. Zealot: the wearer deals +10% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with their area attacks for each stack of the zealot effect.
